detaileddescription.para: Comprehensive error enumeration for all PWM operations in the system. This enumeration is used across all PWM-related classes to provide consistent error reporting and handling.

memberdef.definition: using hf_pwm_period_callback_t = std::function<void(hf_channel_id_t channel_id, void* user_data)>
memberdef.name: hf_pwm_period_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Callback for PWM period complete events.

memberdef.type: std::function< void(hf_channel_id_t channel_id, hf_pwm_err_t error, void *user_data)>
memberdef.definition: using hf_pwm_fault_callback_t = std::function<void(hf_channel_id_t channel_id, hf_pwm_err_t error, void* user_data)>
memberdef.name: hf_pwm_fault_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for PWM implementations in the HardFOC system.

detaileddescription.para: This header-only file defines the abstract base class for PWM generation that provides a consistent API across different PWM implementations. Concrete implementations for various platforms inherit from this class.

simplesect.para: This is a header-only abstract base class following the same pattern as BaseCan/BaseAdc.
Users should program against this interface, not specific implementations.
